title: The Red Siren of the Wood: A Fairy Twisted Tale
description: For years, she was a legend, a myth. A tale told around campfires, whispered in the dark. She was just a story, until she wasn’t anymore.She was Red Siren of the Wood.And, he was destined to be the one to end her...What’s a Fairy Twisted Tale, you may ask?Well, we take a favorite fairy tale, like the girl in the red cloak and the big, bad wolf in the woods—and twist it all up.This 116-page novella contains adult language and adult situations, and is not appropriate for those under 18 years of age.
author: Dixie Painter
